lenders.name: Alvin
lenders.loan_because: If God has blessed you then pay it forward.

lenders.name: Devon

lenders.occupational_info: i work in an office environment

lenders.occupational_info: Small software business owner

I have a desire to see the world in a better light - I am sorounded by greed and at times it becomes very heavy. I too may be affected by this greed without realizing it. I became aware of Kiva through PBS and realized the power that I had as "one of many" .
Thank you my spirit has been lifted with this wonderfull idea.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a manager of a Data Center, ensuring the continuous availability of hardware(computers) and software (applications) to our Customers in North America and additional sourrounding Countries

lenders.name: ashwini kumar
lenders.loan_because: hallo i am a trader share,commodity...but have not enough money to start my trading business.i am just need 100$ loan from you.i will refund this money in 6 months.

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: "From everyone who has been given much, much will be demanded..." Luke 12:48
lenders.occupational_info: I am a mother of two children, and one more on the way.

lenders.name: Herbert & Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: As an entrepeneour, I know well the skill and dedication that is required to get a business going and make it profitable.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: I believe in people.
lenders.occupational_info:
"Eventually, you will come to understand that love heals everything, and Love is all there is."
               Gary Zukav. Seat of the Soul

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I feel that everyone needs a chance. I also believe that you must have faith in people from all aspects of life.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company specializing in providing low income housing to those that can not afford to pay the full amount of rent that is now asked for in the market world.

lenders.name: Doris
lenders.loan_because: There is nothing more important than touching peoples lives in a positive way. I wish all these people much success.
lenders.occupational_info: A nurse provides  many different kinds of services that aims to maintain peoples health now and in the future.

lenders.name: Sean
lenders.loan_because: I believe in this program and the people who use it to borrow money to make a better life for themselves, their families and their communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I work outside in the Sonoran Desert as a landscape construction contractor.  It's not unusual to be working in temperatures ranging from 100-115 degrees. I understand hard work and difficult conditions.

lenders.occupational_info: 1st grade is fun ... except the homework!

lenders.loan_because: I was a Peace Corps volunteer in Ecuador.  I hope to continue that spirit of service throughout my life.
lenders.occupational_info: Technical support for PDA devices and data cards for laptop computers.

lenders.name: Nelson
lenders.loan_because: My heart speaks to me.
lenders.occupational_info: Humble

lenders.name: Debra
lenders.loan_because: this is a great way to facilitate change in our world. We can improve the standard of living for generations to come. Is there a better way to use $25?!

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.loan_because: My dad is a generous person that gives me gift certificates to KIVA. I think it is such a great way to help people in their hard work for a better life.
lenders.occupational_info: Engineering.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a distributor of automotive electrical parts.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student at the Open University. UK.

lenders.name: Barnaby
lenders.loan_because: I've traveled to many countries in my life and spent several months in Uganda working and living.  I've always felt that this model of philanthropy was the best but wasn't aware of this site until I watched a recent FRONTLINE documentary about it.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach Englsih at an ESL program in Osaka, Japan.

lenders.name: Kenneth & Claudette
lenders.loan_because: Jesus said we should help those less fortunate than ourselves.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: I'd like to help people who are building businesses like I do.
lenders.occupational_info:
I have started a few companies that leverage the internet to help businesses be more efficient.  

My current company, DocuSign, Inc. (www.docusign.com)  allows people to send documents for signature online from a PC so they do not need to print and transport paper. This eliminates postage fees, paper fees, and lets users get contracts signed in minutes, not days or weeks.

lenders.name: Berit
lenders.loan_because: I believe in giving people a chance to build their lives.

lenders.name: T&J
lenders.loan_because: There are so many people in need around the world.

lenders.name: Jo Ann
lenders.loan_because: I love this concept.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach web programming, write web programs and develop web content primarily for a government agency that provides health insurance to the uninsured.  In my spare time, I prepare fun web content for myself and my friends.

lenders.name: Overly  Sistahs
lenders.occupational_info: We believe in empowering  a sister's spirit  so that she gains  strength and can improve her family's wellbeing. We are all members of an interconnected global sisterhood.

lenders.name: Kim & Zach
lenders.loan_because: we can

lenders.name: Sachie
lenders.loan_because: I want to help for someone.

lenders.name: Lorrie & Tim
lenders.loan_because: We like the fact that you can make a personal connection with the recipient and the postive impact we can have on other's lives with a simple gesture.

lenders.name: Marjorie
lenders.loan_because: I am trying to be the change I want to see in the world.

lenders.name: Timothy
lenders.loan_because: To repay Jesus for the mercy He has given me.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired pastor and now work full time at a custom publishing company.

lenders.name: Adam

lenders.name: Patrick

lenders.name: Debbie
lenders.loan_because: I am facinated by how others in the world live their daily lives.  I am impressed by the determination and initiative of people from places that to me seem hard to live in.  I love reading their stories of success!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a police officer, more specifically an investigator.  I gather facts to help determine what happened during the commision of a crime and who committed the crime.

lenders.name: Bradley Hansen
lenders.loan_because: I love to help others with their dreams!
lenders.occupational_info: I help others in trouble with the legal system.

lenders.name: Howard
lenders.loan_because: It feels good. I appreciate having a way to give back. I let my children help pick who to lend to so they can become more aware of the world we live in.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping people buy and sell homes and providing information to help them make the best use of their homes while living there.

lenders.name: Stewart
lenders.loan_because: I'd rather help someone to their feet than carry them to their destination.
lenders.occupational_info: I program video games.  Currently, I'm working on a mega multi-player WW2 dogfight game called Aces High

lenders.name: Jack Clinton Eitniear
lenders.loan_because: Its the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: Science journal editor and avian biologist

lenders.name: Mimi
lenders.loan_because: I have been fortunate in my life and work.  This is one way I can do something concrete to help someone to realize his/her desire for living better.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a painter, printmaker, and performance artist.  I am also a mother and grandmother.

lenders.name: Lizbeth
lenders.loan_because: I am grateful for the opportunities I've received and aware there are others more worthy than I.
lenders.occupational_info: I was a high school librarian for many years and now work part time in a medical library.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: I like the micro loan concept as practiced by Kiva (and others). It's satisfying playing a part in assisting others in their entrepreneurial efforts.

lenders.name: Heidi
lenders.loan_because: I believe in paying it forward. Thank you Grandpa and Grandma.
lenders.occupational_info: I keep a large high rise building running smoothly.

lenders.name: dont_panyk
lenders.loan_because: we have an obligation to share our  ideas, our wealth and our commitment with others.
lenders.occupational_info: living lightly upon the earth

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because:
Small efforts to improve the world by enough people can bring about big changes.   
    For a little over an hours worth of work, I can improve the life of an entire family- what's not to love?

lenders.name: Rutul
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of economics and hard work. I am a student of finance and an appreciator of ideas executed right. Since this would be my first attempt at a real "loan", I guess I am doing it because Kiva makes that possible, while making my belief in all the things above stronger.

lenders.name: Dana
lenders.loan_because: If I can make a positive difference in someone else's life, why not?  Kiva gives average people a chance to help each other and communicate good will.
lenders.occupational_info: I have the honor of working with critically ill patients and their families in a hospital's intensive care unit.

lenders.name: Jeffers and Triin
lenders.occupational_info: We study and teach music...

lenders.name: Roy
lenders.loan_because: I like to help others help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach part time and am a volunteer mentor.

lenders.name: Carrie
lenders.loan_because:
I recently learned of the impact even $25 can make to a person's success. I do freelance marketing writing, one of my clients is Sarah's Hope Jewelry, who gives 10% of profits to fund microloans.
As a mother and woman who owns her own business, I want to help other struggling moms out there. I want her children to see, and benefit from, a woman's success.
lenders.occupational_info: After years in the corporate world, I quit my job to be a fulltime mommy. I have a job where I do marketing writing (brochures, catalogs, etc.) on the side to earn extra income and to challenge myself intellectually. It is empowering and important to be able to provide for yourself.

lenders.name: Kala
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other women entrepreneurs succeed in their businesses and become empowered and independent as they work to better their lives as well as the lives of their family members.

lenders.name: Aimee
lenders.loan_because: I've seen people with these kinds of businesses and needs in my travels and hated that I had no way to help - now I do.

lenders.name: Lance
lenders.loan_because: I love start up businesses, I’ve started my own company 3 times so far.  Kiva is a great way to support hard working people who have an entrepreneurial spirit.

lenders.name: Ashley
lenders.loan_because: I can make a direct impact in the quality of another person's life.

lenders.name: Susanna
lenders.loan_because: To be a good steward.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a mother and a wife: cooking, cleaning, dirty diapers, laundry, etc, all the usual!

lenders.name: kelechi
lenders.occupation: a little of this, a little of that

lenders.name: Molly
lenders.loan_because: I love what I do, but the truth is that I spend most of my days making overpriced food for extremely rich people. It satisfies my creative urge, but it doesn't feed my soul.  I wanted to try to do something that actually matters to someone.
lenders.occupational_info: I make fancy desserts..

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I was once destitute and now I have everything I need.  I want to share what I have with others

lenders.name: Margaret
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping people

lenders.name: Lost
lenders.loan_because: We have so much in our lives that we wanted to give back to others who could use help in improving their situation.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a group of Canadian high school students who wanted to make a difference in the lives of people who are less fortunate.

lenders.name: ji unit
lenders.loan_because: Films can make a big difference in raising awareness and affecting public attitudes, but when it comes to immediate impact, there's nothing more effective than direct action, especially when it's from one person to another.

lenders.name: Paras
lenders.loan_because: Let's make some money!!!  ...oh, wait a minute.

lenders.name: Gayle
lenders.loan_because: I feel that I have been very fortunate in life and I have enjoyed this opportunity to give back.  I was so pleased to find Kiva.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a school teacher - I work with children that are 10 years old (4th graders).   I retired from another job to begin teaching.  I just passed a major birthday, and this is my gift to myself.

lenders.name: Victor
lenders.loan_because: Others deserve a chance to succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I help students with disabilities to succeed in higher education.

lenders.name: Chuck & Lori
lenders.loan_because: People are beautiful. People are worthy.

lenders.name: Matt and Steffi
lenders.loan_because: i want to help others improve their life

lenders.name: Christi
lenders.loan_because: I have the money to lend.
lenders.occupational_info: I write for newspapers and magazines. I also take photographs.

lenders.name: Kathryn
lenders.loan_because: This kind of loan provides a way out of extreme poverty for many people around the world. I contribute because it's necessary and the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Pam
lenders.loan_because: Most everyone needs a helping hand now and again.

lenders.name: Juliana
lenders.loan_because:
Our only life is this life.
Our only world is this world.
Our only hope is each other,
And this is enough.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: Teach others to dance.

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: Every individual has the ability to be a positive change in the world!! I lend because I am blessed and want to pass it on.
lenders.occupational_info: I spend half of my life working as a barista and the other half reading books and writing papers for school.

lenders.name: hayden
lenders.loan_because: I care.

lenders.name: Tony
lenders.loan_because: people all over the globe have commonalities; we all want the best for our children, we all want a safe neighborhood, we all want to go to bed each night without hunger, we all need our families and friends around us, we all depend on each other to get by and we all try to live in integrity. The planet ,and everything we receive from it, belongs to all of us and ought  to be shared.
lenders.occupational_info:
I coordinate specialists such as carpenters, plumbers
 and electricians to repair and remodel buildings that are part of the local government such as fire and police stations and libraries.

lenders.name: julie / stony
lenders.loan_because: we all need help sometimes...
lenders.occupational_info: we are building and installing wind turbines in isolated communities from the Caribbean Coast of Nicaragua and sometimes  we get to swim in Carribean sea and eat coconuts

lenders.name: Kindness Cures
lenders.loan_because: I believe in basic goodness!
lenders.occupational_info: I Create to inspire! Our products help to  elevate awareness in the power of loving kindness!

lenders.name: Cortney
lenders.loan_because:
PHILIPPIANS 2:3-4   
"Don't be selfish; don't live to make a good impression on others. Be humble, thinking of others as better than yourself. Don't think only about your own affairs, but be interested in others, too, and what they are doing."
lenders.occupational_info: I hire and train people, create policies, and help employees who work for a non-profit organization.

lenders.name: Ryan
lenders.loan_because: It's something I can do to make a tangible change.

lenders.name: Skye
lenders.loan_because: The world thrives on compassion and inspiration.

lenders.name: Peter & Darcy
lenders.loan_because: Helping others in this manner improves lives and is a way of honoring God.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a business that calibrates measuring instruments and controls, and measures coatings. Darcy is business manager for a brick sales company.

lenders.name: Leila
lenders.loan_because: There is nothing greater than helping those who need the most, especially when able to see the impact it has in their lives. Just to see the change for the better in someone else's life makes every day worth living.
lenders.occupational_info: 24/7 Non-stop challenging work immersed in lots of love and patience. I am a caregiver, negotiator, teacher, cook, chaufeur fully engaged in my daughters' lives. It can get stressful at times but definitely most rewarding job I've ever had.

lenders.name: Ronald
lenders.loan_because: I have visited 43 countries. Everywhere I go, I meet wonderful, hardworking people who are willing to work hard but need a hand getting started.
lenders.occupational_info: Our non-profit organization helps leaders start new churches. I am directional leader of the organization.

lenders.name: Donald
lenders.loan_because: It’s important to think and act globally.  We have a responsibility to our brethren worldwide,  and this is a great way to help those who are helping themselves.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: it' the right thing.
lenders.occupational_info: Work at a weekly newspaper.

lenders.name: Janet
lenders.loan_because: I want to help hardworking creative people get a chance to put their plans into action.
lenders.occupational_info: I am also an enterpreneur.

lenders.name: Bruce
lenders.loan_because: to help those in need.

lenders.name: William
lenders.occupation: Youth Conservation Corps at Fort Moultrie

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: People everywhere want to be productive.  Lending is a way to give a helping hand up, rather than a hand out.  A hand out is about me, a hand up is about them.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a state water resources agency.

lenders.name: lynn
lenders.loan_because: As a woman in business I know how difficult it is. I would like to help other women in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a landscape contractor.  I design gardens and plant them with my crew.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.occupational_info: I schedule planes for casinos in the Southern US.

lenders.name: Tom & Cindy
lenders.loan_because: After doing foster care for nine years and adopting two African/American boys, we want to do more for the world we live in. This is a great opportunity to help others who are helping themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Tom sells woodworking machinery and Cindy writes Inspirational fiction.

lenders.name: Dawn
lenders.loan_because: Im obedient to what we are all called to do - Love!

lenders.name: Josie
lenders.loan_because: In honor of my cousin, Eric, who was a Kiva supporter.

lenders.name: Samantha
lenders.loan_because: God has given me the ability to share His wealth with others.

lenders.name: Sue
lenders.loan_because: it might just help one person know someone cares.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with young children ages 0 to 6 years old and their teachers in a small yet dedicated school district.  Many of our families live in poverty and are immigrants.

lenders.name: Jacques & Lisa
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed us with so much so that He can bless others through us.

lenders.name: Pamela
lenders.loan_because: I think support should be given to those who are willing and able to work, and who have goals for their businesses and lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I worked for 31 years in the communications industry, selling equipment to large businesses.  I am now retired and do some jewelry making and traveling.

lenders.name: Sona
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping others to help themselves.  Kiva is a great way to make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired gift store owner and now an avid quilter.

lenders.name: Kent
lenders.loan_because: I just want to help.

lenders.name: randy
lenders.loan_because: I heard about Kiva listening to NPR radio, my favorite station.  I first heard about microlending when the Nobel Peace Prize was awarded in 2006 to Mr. Yunus.  I was amazed to learn of the micro-lending concept he started way back in 1976 in Bangledesh - and since then had made over 6 million loans.  Kiva is a great way to be involved.
lenders.occupational_info: As VP of sales for the ministry division of Thomas Nelson Publishers (the largest Christian book and Bible publisher) we help non-profit organizations develop product strategies for donor development  and fundraising using our products.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I want to enable small business owners to be successful, because their success will benefit their communities, their family and themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Aerospace engineer.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: i care.

lenders.name: Sesh
lenders.loan_because: family, friends and strangers have helped me in my life journey and in turn I lend a hand to others.
lenders.occupational_info: I create videos and animation to help educate people.

lenders.name: Alfredo
lenders.loan_because: It helps to generate income permanently.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a science teacher.

lenders.name: Yolanda & Luit
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we care, can ,feel compelled to and are blessed by God to do so.

lenders.name: Carolyn
lenders.loan_because: I would like to share what I can with others. I believe in supporting the dreams of small business owners.
lenders.occupational_info: I keep financial records for small businesses. It is something I enjoy doing because I know it is helpful and it gives the business owner more time to run their business.

lenders.name: Norm
lenders.loan_because: I want people to have an opportunity to succeed in business.
lenders.occupational_info: The ultimate mobile auto detailing for Pierce County. A fully equipped, powered mobile unit that is outfitted with everything needed to provide vehicles the finest professional detail available.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone deserves a chance to improve their lives.

lenders.name: Stacy
lenders.loan_because: I want to teach my daughters and others that small gestures can change lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I save land.

lenders.name: Sinisa Jurcic
lenders.loan_because: i can
lenders.occupational_info: industrial automation and control

lenders.name: John McWhorter
lenders.loan_because: Just tryin' to be the change I want to see.
lenders.occupational_info: I try to fix what's broken and learn stuff along the way.

lenders.name: Kelvin & Anastasia
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of microloans. It seems to me that Kiva.org harnesses the collective power of many individuals to help one person help themselves, and, by extension, to help those around them.
lenders.occupational_info: My job is to help students from around the world improve their English so they can continue their education in an institution where English is the language of instruction.

lenders.name: Caspar
lenders.loan_because: I believe in promoting entrepreneurship to reduce poverty.

lenders.name: Ben
lenders.occupation: Australian Youth Representative to the UN

lenders.name: Dave & Amy
lenders.loan_because: Its the right thing to do and we are so rich in so many things "Love is all you need"
lenders.occupational_info: musician and comedian

lenders.name: Julia
lenders.loan_because: I believe in you! GOOD LUCK!
lenders.occupational_info: www.julia-t.com

lenders.name: Sylvia
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a great idea. Help people to help themselves

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: As a family it helps us feel connected to the rest of the world. For us it is good to remember that where we are in the world is just a result of accidents of birth. When the refugee boats were being turned away off the coast of Australia a few years ago, I couldn't help thinking that we (with all our unique and special qualities) could have been sitting huddled on those boats if we had just been born somewhere else in the world (and if a few bad things had happened to us!). I want my children to realise that everyone is special and everyone deserves "a go" as we'd say in Australia. Have a go.
lenders.occupational_info: We work for the Australian public service collecting statistics like the Census of Population and Housing.

lenders.name: Xav
lenders.loan_because: everyone should share.

lenders.name: Kit
lenders.loan_because: a small amount of money for me can make a big difference to someone else

lenders.name: Maggie
lenders.loan_because: I watched a programme on CNN and thought what a brilliant idea and so started loaning and then continued reinvesting the money.I want to help people who are prepared to help themselves. I would like to help to give them that chance. I think it is a 'hand up' not a 'hand out'.
lenders.occupational_info: I previously worked in social housing and with the homeless. Now retired and living in Northern Cyprus

lenders.name: Sterling
lenders.loan_because: Some people need help to improve their lives. Ripping off their nation's assets, bombing them or supporting their often odious dictators as is the custom of the Land 'O Freedom  Folks (America the Greatest) is just not enough.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a member of the community of human beings who believe that the earth and its inhabitants can and should be sustainable.

lenders.name: Ashley
lenders.loan_because: I feel a need to help out those who haven't had the chances I have been given...
lenders.occupational_info: I test the engines that go on planes.

lenders.name: Russell
lenders.loan_because: I believe it's the true, good, and right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I fly for the UN which makes me a nomad. I have no fixed home and work two months on location then have a month off. I spend a lot of my time off in Bali and South Africa.

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to help people that are trying to help themselves. Our American dollars go so much farther in these countries.
lenders.occupational_info: I had a career in the big city now I live in rural area and work part time occasionally doing inspections and taking photos for a residential appraisal company.

lenders.name: pavitra
lenders.loan_because: I can understand  the necessity for seed fund  or working capital an entreprenuer. I just did the  channeling
lenders.occupational_info: Business Consulting

lenders.name: Neil, Linda & Family
lenders.loan_because: We can and opportunities should be shared as widely as possible.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: As a small business owner, I understand the challenges of following your dreams and supporting a family.  I am excited to help someone else follow their heart and realize their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an artist who loves to paint Pugs and other dog breeds.  I love to share my art with others and spread the joy that my pug, Emmitt, gives to me.

lenders.name: The G'Ma & Pop Fund
lenders.loan_because: When my grandfather died I missed his funeral because I was overseas, but in my travels I witnessed extreme poverty that changed my view of the world. When my Grandmother passed away a couple of years later and left me a small amount of money, I decided that lending that money to those in need is a fitting tribute. The memory of my grandparents lives on through these loans - adding to others' lives as they once added to mine and my family.

lenders.name: Jared
lenders.loan_because: I feel this is the most effective way to create change. Most philanthropic groups (including the IMF and World Bank) adopt to much of a top down approach.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently in Graduate school studying International Relations and I work at a development consulting firm.

lenders.name: Sherri
lenders.loan_because: We should help others who are willing to work hard and improve their lives.

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: I have faith in people.
lenders.occupational_info: I raise awareness and funds for a nonprofit emergency food provider

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I want to.

lenders.name: Amanda
lenders.loan_because: I appreciate the opportunities I've been given in my life and would like to extend opportunities to others who may not have them otherwise.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a research lab in which we study cancer genetics in order to help people live healthier lives.

lenders.name: Victoria
lenders.loan_because: I like the cyclical nature of the loan stream and how many people can benefit from the same few hundred dollars.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a video editor on Documentary films.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: Loans help the economy of a given region, where donations help undermine the economy and put hard working people (seen on this site) out of work as they cannot compete with free foreign goods.

lenders.name: Lisa,Daniel,Jacob,Max
lenders.loan_because: we want to assist another family with reaching their goals and achieving their dreams : )
lenders.occupational_info: Lisa Marie:   first, i'm Mom.  i'm a student (psychology, social work, art, theater), and i'm a youth mentor for PeaceJam and ArtWorks! Art Club.  Daniel:  first, he's Dad.  Art Teacher for 8th and 9th Grade.  Artist and musician (band is Deep Fried Pickle Project), mentor and sponsor for PeaceJam and Artworks! Art Club.    Jacob:  Student...and oldest : )  he loves to go to summer camp, play with legos and xbox and hang with his cousin.  loves to help others and enjoys wrestling and tae kwon do.  Max:  youngest...on his way to 6th grade.  he loves acting and singing.  loves legos, hanging with his cousin, and helping people.  oh...he also loves summer camp!!

lenders.name: Melanie
lenders.loan_because: I like to help others achieve their dreams
lenders.occupational_info: I help my customers get the products and answers to questions that they need to do their jobs well.

lenders.name: Christian
lenders.loan_because: economic self-betterment is the answer to poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I study the effects of farming on air quality.

lenders.name: Cathy
lenders.loan_because: I love Jesus.  I have also seen the benefit of one person helping another.  If every person that "has" would help one person that "has not", the world would be a different place.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a large bank developing computer programs.

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: we are all connected in this world.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people talk and connect with each other.

lenders.name: Whitney-rose
lenders.loan_because: Microloans are the gift that keeps giving. It honors and respects those in need by not giving them simply a hand out but instead giving them the opportunity to make the life they've dreamed about come true out of their own work. I am honored to help in this way. Check out http://www.povertyfighters.com it is one of those free click sites that also donates money for microloans
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently finishing my education and will be teaching children soon. I don't know what age they will be though they will likely be between 5 and 10 years of age.

lenders.name: Thao
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others have some sense of well-being and hope.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a technology company and I find people to join our team.

lenders.name: Wells Trust
lenders.loan_because: Wells Trust supports entrepreneurs, farmers, artists, designers, and writers throughout the world, empowering the individual within the community.

lenders.name: Wendy
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to help people who want to be more of who they are.
lenders.occupational_info: I work exclusively with people of heart and integrity, who know they are here to make a bigger difference, and who have an unshakeable commitment to their own expansion. And I help them to make that bigger difference with more ease and more connection to ALL of their potentials.

lenders.name: Alexander
lenders.loan_because: I believe in individuals helping each other out. I have been the recipient of such wonderful support from local people when traveling in various countries around the world and this seemed to be a great way to begin to pay some of it back.
lenders.occupational_info: I create software that helps insure that complex systems behave as designed.

lenders.name: Anthony & Manon
lenders.loan_because: Pay it Forward :-)

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: a motivated person trapped in a hopeless life can be driven to insane acts in a desperate attempt to change the system. The same person with a little hope may instead improve the system for us all.

lenders.name: Kristina
lenders.loan_because: I believe that projects like kiva are pivotal to increasing global understanding and communication, while they give people an opportunity to support each other.
lenders.occupational_info: I direct and perform in a performing arts company that includes dance, acrobatics, aerial, and fire performance.

lenders.name: berner
lenders.loan_because:
I feel like anything i do for others I do in the name of Christ and hope that with it I help plant the seed of my Father's love.
Share your blessing with others as I have shared my own blessing with  you.

lenders.name: Russell
lenders.loan_because: I want to and can!
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an esitmator for a regional construction company.

lenders.name: Kate
lenders.loan_because: It seems like a good thing to do.  I hope it helps people see a kinder side of America.
lenders.occupational_info: I write the words that appear on websites, packages and advertisements.

lenders.name: Mary Anne
lenders.loan_because: I am so very fortunate and I want to share my good fortune with others.

lenders.name: Steven
lenders.loan_because: It is an amazing chance to bring entrepreneurship to someone.  There are so many great business people that might not have the chance to do what they want if it were not for MFI and social lending opportunities.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a hospital verifying insurance and I find it very interesting how much people don't know about their own coverage or lack there of.  I also work at a homeless shelter which has opened my eyes to the disadvantaged of my own society, since things are so expensive here, I feel that I can help more abroad.  I am also into research and I am looking for correlations between words and market movements.

lenders.name: Sarma
lenders.loan_because: God has been kind to me in many ways. So, I want to see how this works and in the process help someone if I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I analyze information needs from our business partners and provide technical solutions.

lenders.name: Lee Zalben
lenders.loan_because: My small business would never have succeeded without the support of others who had faith in me.

Peanut Butter & Co. offers 10 flavors of delicious peanut butter that #TasteAmazing

We're 100% all-natural and made exclusively from USA-grown peanuts.

lenders.name: Paula
lenders.loan_because: It makes my heart happy!

lenders.name: Sean+
lenders.loan_because: I used to tutor literacy and English as a Second Language; I sponsor a child in Indonesia; and this is another, a different way to help. Outright charity is appropriate in some situations; loans are better in others.

lenders.name: Bill and Capalene
lenders.loan_because: We know it can make a significant difference in one person's life.
lenders.occupational_info: Bill works for a major medical non-profit in fundraising; Capalene is a 6th grade language arts (english) teacher

lenders.name: Janet and Les
lenders.loan_because: Our parents taught us to work hard and you will be a success. Our loans help those in other countries reap the success they deserve - because they too work hard!
lenders.occupational_info: We are retired and now travel fulltime in the U.S. in our RV.  Les was employed by the oil and gas industry. Janet was a social worker.

lenders.name: Micayla
lenders.loan_because: Its the cool thing to do!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: Society has created some problems in the world and people are solution, one person at a time.  ( I want to be one of them)
lenders.occupational_info: I am the co-founder of a non-profit called Pink Penguin Press  www.pinkpenguinpress.org and a company called Ribbon Nutrition

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: It is time to give back.

lenders.name: Kim
lenders.loan_because: I love the concept of giving my hard-earned money to a very specific cause, and to see the fruits of mine and my loanee's labor. The whole world is a community and this is such a great incentive to help from afar.
lenders.occupational_info: I re-design the interior of buildings...a room here, a bathroom there, a kitchen over there, and make it all work together for function and beauty.

lenders.name: Lyz
lenders.loan_because: There is so much to be shared
lenders.occupational_info: Former Kiva Fellow, now Kiva Fellows Program Intern at Kiva in San Francisco

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: I feel that everyone should have the opportunity to succeed in life. If you have a good idea,  its something you really believe in, and its going to be of benefit to you and your family; then you deserve the investment capital.  Failure for lack of dedication is deserved, failure for lack of resources is a tragedy.
lenders.occupational_info:
I work for a political party as an organizer. The specific area I work in is IT/ Software and I provide training and support. 

Its a wonderful career!

lenders.name: antti
lenders.loan_because: It's Kivaa (means fun in Finnish)

lenders.name: Maya & Bill

lenders.name: Sebastian
lenders.loan_because: its fun to share
lenders.occupational_info: I help people with their computers

lenders.name: Anastasiya
lenders.loan_because: I think it's a small way to make a small difference.

lenders.name: Carlos
lenders.loan_because: Life is about helpin others!!!!

lenders.name: Raph
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Wendy
lenders.loan_because: I can!  I've had people help me in the past and now is my turn to "pay-it-forward".
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a Certified Public Accountant.  I prepare financial statements and income tax returns for my clients.

lenders.name: Trish
lenders.loan_because: While traveling in India I spent 2 days in little villages meeting with women who were paying back loans to a mico-finance organization. I remember noticing the average loans were 5000 rupees and that was the cost of the sunglasses I was wearing that day...I strongly believe in empowering people with sustainable ways to support themselves rather than charity. I will never forget how appreciative these women were and how much of of a difference it had made to their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: World of  Arts

lenders.name: Suzi
lenders.loan_because: I think that Westerners have a moral obligation to support people in developing countries. Kiva gives me the opportunity to do that directly.

lenders.name: Utari
lenders.loan_because: I want everyone to taste success with maximum efforts and positive attitudes.

lenders.name: Ilonna
lenders.loan_because: I've spent a lifetime using my disposable income on only myself.  I'd wanted to make a change but didn't find anything I really liked.  When I saw the news program about micro-loans on CBS I said - "That's it... It's perfect."
lenders.occupational_info: Corporate Media Production

lenders.name: Susan

lenders.occupational_info: I manage a health care program in a large hospital.

lenders.name: Lawrence

I work in Communication on large ships.

I love my fellow humans, and I realize that many hard-working individuals do not seek charity; they simply lack the capitol to build a successful business, and a better life.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a grad student at UMass Medical School, where I am pursuing my PhD in biochemistry.

lenders.name: Håkan & Lena

We feel the need to help other people, just like our parents helped us to a good education and a better life. To give and to help is one of the greatest pleasures in life. 

We will make loans to the people of Tajikistan since we have a few friends from there and we know life is not so easy there.
lenders.occupational_info: Our work is Interesting, exciting and international. It helps us broaden our horizons. We are meeting new interesting people all the time.

lenders.name: Trish & Aaron
lenders.occupation: Grad Students (both of us) ; A/V tech; PT retail
lenders.loan_because: We recognize we are very fortunate to live where we live and have what we have. We would like to share with others in order to make someone else's quality of life that much better.

Aaron is studying Political Science & Trish is studying to be a Speech-Language Pathologist. Aaron is currently working full time as an audio-visual technician (he helps set up microphones, TVs, computer displays, etc. in various meetings of his company) and Trish works part-time at a sports store.

lenders.loan_because: I'ts a great idea to help people get started on something better.
lenders.occupational_info: Trabajo con computadores.

lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.loan_because: It doesn't always take much to make a world of difference.  And we are fortunate enough to have a little extra to share.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on groundwater policy issues

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people make the world a better place for my daughter and son.
lenders.occupational_info: I try to heal people and the world in the name of God.

lenders.occupational_info: After working for a large company for 35 years and gaining a lot of different experience, I now help my customers by providing recommendations to help their business be more successful.

lenders.loan_because: these entrepreneurs work their butts off to make ends meet and need help, and this is the most sustainable way to do so.

lenders.loan_because: So little can do so much...

lenders.loan_because: I think it's the most effective means of sustainable development and a wonderful opportunity to empower hardworking individuals who are dedicated to improving living standards for themselves and their families; hopefully they too will recognize their responsibility to pay it forward.

lenders.name: Travis
lenders.loan_because: Money is a liquid resource that benefits from moving, otherwise it stagnates.  The secret of a healthy economy is not hoarding.

lenders.name: Ana-Maria

lenders.occupational_info: I collect stories and other lovely things.

lenders.name: Blu Ashton
lenders.loan_because: I thoroughly believe in people helping themselves and getting a fair chance to do so.

lenders.name: Zari Sussman
lenders.loan_because: Helping someone to help themselves is the greatest good.

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should have chance to accomplish a dream
lenders.occupational_info: I collect income and asset information from clients and put it together to present to a lender/bank  to prove the clients ability to re-pay the loan they've requested to purchase a home.

lenders.name: Jagular
lenders.loan_because: I have known many people from very poor countries and I always hear their stories of poverty.  I would like to do something to help people who want to come out of poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a very large hospital in a big American city.  I care for the sick and I like to see them become well again.

lenders.name: Edward
lenders.loan_because: I need to give back some of what I have received. To give is to receive
lenders.occupational_info: As a retired person I am on my churches social justice commission.  I don't work I play.

lenders.loan_because: i can!

lenders.name: Bill and Carrol
lenders.loan_because: We enjoy assisting others.

lenders.name: Curt Rosengren
lenders.loan_because: It feels good. Simple as that. :-)
lenders.occupational_info: I help people figure out how to put their passion to work to make a difference that inspires them, in a way that lets them thrive.

lenders.name: John C. Kirkland
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to make themselves successful
lenders.occupational_info: John C. Kirkland has handled billions of dollars in public offerings and private placements of debt and equity securities for leading investment banks, private equity firms and public companies.  As a practicing securities attorney for more than 20 years, he was known for developing advanced public financing structures.  As a Managing Director at institutional investor Ironridge Global Partners, John Kirkland makes direct equity investments in micro-cap public companies.

lenders.name: Katy
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others make positive local changes.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am currently working at a National Estuarine Research Reserve in Mt. Vernon, Washington, USA. I teach kids and adults about estuaries: places where fresh water from the land meets salt water from the sea. Estuaries are important "nursery" habitats for many types of birds, fish and other animals, because they are shallow and protected and produce a huge amount of food! 2/3 of the world's estuaries have been developed, so it is important that we take good care of the ones that are still intact. I take people on field trips to the local beach and then explain how each of them can help protect estuaries and their local watershed. I will be working here until the end of August.

This September, I will be starting graduate school at the University of Washington in Forestry and Public Policy.

lenders.name: Turner-Benvenutto Family
lenders.loan_because: It's great to feel connected to people working hard to achieve their dreams.  Kiva makes the world small. It's nice to help a neighbor.
lenders.occupational_info: My wife home schools our 8 year old son. I am a business manager studying architecture.  I'd like to build homes that are good for the environment (energy efficient) and healthy for the people who live in them (non-toxic).   Much of my free time is spent as a volunteer fire fighter.   We respond to structure fires, wild fires, river rescue, and vehicle accidents.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: If we believe in economic justice, we must be willing to give up some of our privilege and invest in the enfranchisement of many.
lenders.occupational_info: On the path to becoming a licensed doctor of Chinese medicine (herbs, acupuncture, nutrition).  So excited about contributing to a healthier world! ;-)

lenders.name: Ryan
lenders.loan_because: $25 once, can continue to get re-loaned forever. How can you not do it?

lenders.name: Kreg
lenders.loan_because: Humanity means we're all in this together.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: We're are all in this together.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a radiation physicist, interested in how to detect, identify and quantify  radioactive materials.

lenders.name: Madhu
lenders.loan_because: its the least i can do.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: I believe that Jesus Christ calls us to love our fellow man.  Helping someone find a way to improve their livelihood allows us to live as we were made to be.
lenders.occupational_info: I type things into a computer today so more people can do less typing tomorrow.

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop software for a university.

lenders.name: Tom and Judy
lenders.occupation: retired Engineer and retired Computer Programmer

lenders.name: Lynn
lenders.loan_because: I lived in South America for 2 years and saw people in desperate situations seek out predatory lenders, which in the end only exacerbated their poverty. I know that microfinance is a constructive way to get people out of poverty without creating dependency, and I hope to see it grow throughout the world.

lenders.name: Debbie and Adam
lenders.occupational_info: Debbie does advocacy work for ZERO TO THREE, a non-profit promoting the healthy development of infants & toddlers.  Adam is an attorney specializing in free speech and freedom of the press.

lenders.name: karen
lenders.loan_because: I think it is an opportunity to give something back.
lenders.occupational_info: I am interested in growing organic food on small scales.

lenders.name: Judy
lenders.loan_because: I've been more fortunate than many and it's time for me to give back.  I believe in giving people a "hand up" and my experience with Kiva tells me that given an extra "hand", people can make real strides towards improving the quality of their lives.
lenders.occupational_info:
I work in the life sciences field and focus on the development of new products and markets.

I appreciate the entrepreneurial spirit and respect the hard work of the many entrepreneurs that Kiva supports.

lenders.name: gerald
lenders.loan_because: I believe in "Being the change I want to see in the world", to quote Ghandi
lenders.occupational_info: Cooking, tending bar, managing restaurants or bars, etc.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people and try to make a difference in people's lives. Pay it forward. =)

lenders.name: Elaine
lenders.loan_because: I want to support the initiative of these entrepreneurs.
lenders.occupational_info: I left my work in the non-profit sector in August 2010 to go to Yale Divinity School in New Haven, CT. I've long felt a call into ordained ministry as a way of preaching good news to the poor and exhorting those who have to share the wealth with those who have not!

lenders.name: Ray & Linda
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is an easy way to offer assistance.  We enjoy seeing our portfolio grow over time as we make new loans and re-loan the funds that are paid back.
lenders.occupational_info: Ray works in institutional research at Westminster College.

lenders.name: Ron
lenders.loan_because: I've been fortunate to have perhaps a little more than I need, so I'd like to pass on something to someone who has less than they need.

lenders.name: Ava
lenders.loan_because: I feel that it's right to give money to people in need so they can make a living too.  I feel really happy that I helped at least one person, and I'm just a kid and I'm helping grownups and their kids!
lenders.occupational_info: As a student I work hard and try to get my grades really good.  I work on reading and math and I'm really happy that I'm going into first grade.

lenders.name: Dixie
lenders.loan_because:
Here in the United States, even if you think that you do not have much,  you have more than most.  I am not a millionaire, or even a person with hundreds of thousands. I went to China in 2007, and the trip taught me just how very much I do have.  Seeing women beg in the street for money for milk to give their children, cripples crutching by me using sticks, it was a real wake up call. 
it feels good to keep a map of places and people that I have helped. One day, I want to have helped people in every country of the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the construction business, and in the photography business. I take pictures and I build things.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because:
My little bit makes a difference. 
And, all of our little bits will change the world for the better.

The task of eliminating extremes of wealth and poverty is one thing that humanity must do before there will be world peace.
Agencies like KIVA are a step in that direction. 

I hope you join us in making a difference.

P.S. When you join. Join a team. If you are a Baha'i, join the Baha'i Team. http://www.kiva.org/team/kiva_bahais

"Let deeds, not words, be your adorning." 
-Bahá'u'lláh 

.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Registered Nurse. I work as a team leader in a local hospital.

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info:
I develop buildings for low-income people.
www.lihi.org

lenders.name: Dan
lenders.loan_because: Someday I'll have more to give than my time...  someday.
lenders.occupational_info: Fueling a desire to learn.

lenders.name: erica
lenders.loan_because: The world's a small place and we all need as much support and encouragement as we can get.

lenders.name: Cassandra
lenders.loan_because: opportunity opens doors.

lenders.name: Kirsten
lenders.loan_because: there is so much inequality in the world, and this might be a tiny step in the right direction.
lenders.occupational_info: I work to end violence against women.

lenders.name: April
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed financially and want to pass the blessing along.  I believe in 'Paying it Forward'
lenders.occupational_info: I am so blessed to be able to stay home and care for my children.  My husband and I have three biological children and we've adopted three.  We have three boys and three girls ranging in ages from 14 years down to 1 1/2 years old.

lenders.name: Desiree
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed and in a position to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an attorney devoted to helping others.

lenders.name: Philip
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Celeste
lenders.loan_because: This is a small way that I can give back and help someone else.  I believe if everyone did a little something like this our world would be a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a homemaker with three children.  Mario is 12, Mia is 6 and Micah is 4.  I stay very busy volunteering at their school and keeping the household in order.  My husband is a police officer who works very hard to support our family.

lenders.name: Eva
lenders.loan_because: People around the world should help each other

lenders.name: Randall
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed with opportunities to have and enjoy a good life,  and  would like to help others do the same.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English to adults in universities and cultural centers in Kobe/Osaka, Japan

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good to be able to help others.  A small loan can go such a long way.

lenders.name: Rose
lenders.loan_because: I believe that micro-finance is one of the best ways to help people in need-it both provides and empowers.

lenders.name: Sinead
lenders.loan_because: As a small business owner, I have been given many opportunities for growth in my business.  To help someone else with this is an amazing opportunity!
lenders.occupational_info: Every day people who don't know me give me the gift of walking into my office and sharing their lives with me, asking for my help.  It is an amazing way to spend my time.

lenders.name: Dick
lenders.loan_because: I care & want to help someone help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired electrical worker of power lines.

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: I have had so much by accident of birth being in a wealthy country; sharing is good.

lenders.name: Natasha & Dave
lenders.loan_because: I am financially able to do so.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with children and my husband writes computer software.

lenders.name: Rick
lenders.loan_because: I want to help, and show my kids that we can make a difference in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Selling ideas, and helping businesses grow.

lenders.name: Andrew, Amanda & Callum
lenders.loan_because: Let's face it, the world is really just one big country & the sooner we realise it, the better off we'll all be. Until this fact becomes obvious to all, it should be the responsibility of the planet's more fortunate citizens to help her less fortunate citizens in what ever manner possible. Viva Kiva!
lenders.occupational_info: I draw maps, mostly of places I will never visit.

lenders.name: VICTOR
lenders.loan_because: I want to print my magazine which contains the message of life to the people of nigeria, so as to change them from corruption to a better face of life. Am a founder of an organization named: MCLIM ASSIDUOUS WORLD.
lenders.occupational_info: Am an author.

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: I want to spread my good.
lenders.occupational_info: Telecommunications VOIP manager

lenders.name: Trevor
lenders.loan_because: Access to capital is a key ingrediant to prosperity.

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: With as little as a $25.00 investment in the hopes and dreams of people around the world who are working to become self-sufficient, you can make a difference in the lives of others. Also, my daughter, Liz, previously worked at KIVA.org.
lenders.occupational_info: Marketing Communications  encompasses all the communications between an organization and its audiences, including advertising, sales promotion, personal selling, publicity, public relations, and direct marketing. I am fortunate to work for a community foundation and people who are passionate about making a difference through philanthropy.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I loan in honor of those I've met around the world who have shared their stories with me.

lenders.name: NanoFina
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the entrepreneur spirit and to give someone a chance to work for him/herself.  Also, in a small way I can help change someone's life for the better.

lenders.name: Lynne
lenders.loan_because: I think this a great way to help people overseas to help themselves
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the International Student Affairs Office at the University of Missouri-Kansas City

lenders.name: Liz
lenders.loan_because: I believe in giving something back.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage teams of scientists and doctors that develop pharmaceutical drugs.

lenders.name: Carl & Michele
lenders.loan_because: We have seen what opportunities can do for people who want to support themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Challenging and fun!

lenders.name: Gary
lenders.loan_because: I like to help.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: poverty sucks.

lenders.name: DMA
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I use TV, the Internet and mobile phones to expand educational possibilities for people.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: By working together encouraging sustainable ventures, we can accomplish so much.
lenders.occupational_info: We supply our customers some of the world's best coffee at reasonable prices.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: It seemed like a good thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach kids math.

lenders.name: L L
lenders.loan_because: It never hurts to lend a hand.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: Efforts toward social sustainability are "the right thing to do".

lenders.name: Sue
lenders.loan_because: "Some people have more than they need, other people need more than they have"
lenders.occupational_info: I try to connect people with the book or piece of information they need, when they need it - not unlike what Kiva strives to do with small business owners and loans.

lenders.name: Randy Fay
lenders.occupation: bicycle tourist and former Kiva Fellows
lenders.loan_because: It is our pleasure to do a little tiny part to share in someone else's life.
lenders.occupational_info: We are bicycling from the north pole to the south pole in the Americas

lenders.name: Nancy Lewis
lenders.occupation: Kiva Fellow with Friendship Bridge in Guatemala
lenders.loan_because: It is a pleasure to share!
lenders.occupational_info: We are taking interviewing the women clients of MFI Friendship Bridge in Guatemala and posting them on the Kiva website.

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: It is needed. And it is easy!
lenders.occupational_info: I shoot news.

lenders.name: Scott & Kelly
lenders.loan_because: We have so  much. We must help
lenders.occupational_info: We build custom homes

lenders.name: The Four of Us
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we want to share the blessings we have been given.

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: I can. My husband and I have been fortunate in life. I care about people and Kiva allows me to make a difference, person to person.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as the assistant to the President of my company. It is a large, private ambulance service. I am very proud of our work.

lenders.name: Zoe
lenders.loan_because: I am amazed that such a relatively small amount of money (by US standards) can go so far in helping someone improve their life.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: It makes a difference

lenders.name: Robin
lenders.loan_because: I am lucky and I am able.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach 11-15 year old middle school students in a free public school.

lenders.name: CrystalGypsy Designs
lenders.loan_because: My jewelry business was started through an inheritance and would not exist if it wasnt for this geneorosity, so I love to help people in any way that I can to support their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I love my work. I grew up as a musician and singer that has seen me tour and record with major international artists acorss the globe. I now have a jewelry company as well that incorporates talismans from around the world, especially old amulets from Tibet. This work led to becoming an energy healer and my jewelry is energized with reiki. You can find my music at www.spacejunky.com

lenders.name: Cindy
lenders.loan_because: It seems like magic to me. Several years ago I invested in Kiva and the money keeps giving. I loan, get paid back and loan again knowing that I'm improving lives in countries I could only hope to visit: Paraguay, Armenia, Lebanon, Mongolia and Tajikistan to name just a few.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: I can make a difference
